title: So Riot nerfs Rek'sai despite her being blind...
body:
{{champion:64}}?

It's almost 2017, Riot. You don't need to favor men over women anymore. Make Lee Sin remove his tattoos, they give him too much armor.

Krappa.

replies.body: I don't even know what to say. +1
Just blush and stammer, it's kawaii enough to warrant the speechlessness.
I...It not like a like your joke... BAKA...

{{champion:421}} has never seen a buff in her life Q.Q 
#downwiththepatriarchy
#killallleesins
Does she need one though? Genuine question here.. she looks fun to play.
She's been nerfed almost to oblivion thanks to worlds. She hung on, by a finger. She might need one or two.
Her map control and free vision are too strong in organized play. She needs a rework.
She needs a rework...? Over having a niche of vision? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} She doesnt need a rework. She had this and thats what made her unique. You want that to be removed from her?
No, but I'll sacrifice it for her to be playable outside of organized play again.

But she can. Every single champion in the game can be played out of organized. So what if its difficult? Its still fun, and its rewarding when you do play correctly. Im not particularly fond of your opinion...

She does. you have to play truly exceptional to carry in any way with her. She has been way over nerfed do to how much she's picked in competitive even though, actually terrible in lcs too now. she was played in 140 games and had a fuking 18% winrate... Pros still pick her cause they are meta slaves(and i legit think they are trying to make watching them as boring as possible) and want her "tremor sense", but it's gotten to the point that she is so weak as a champion that she's just a pretty much a mobile ward. Her value as a champion is almost nonexistent, which is a real shame cause she has an awesome design IMO it's just one small part of her kit that is abused in lcs.

What's so special about 2016/2017?

I know you're kidding, but I'm starting to find it annoying when people say that.  Even just 3 years down the line we'll likely stop seeing 2017 as being an important year (2016 at least has the election, but it's the election and not the year that'll be seen as relevant).
>Here’s where we celebrate the best of League memes and ridiculous in-jokey games. Ok? Don’t take yourself too seriously here, and share your favorite GIFs and memes by starting a discussion today.

As I said, I know you were joking and all.  Sorry if I sounded super serious or anything.

I'm usually pretty lighthearted in the M&G boards.
This meme brought a tear to my eye, that's how spicy it was. Well done sir, well done.
